idea:
Music Literacy Mission 

Music is not just an Art or Entertainment. The Hindustani Shastriya Sangeet has for centuries been a Science to bring important benefits to human mind such as wellness and improved cognition. We are taking Hindustani Shastriya Sangeet to the world by the way of Auditory diet, where the Sound Waves are used for positive effect on Brain Waves. 

With a simple App the Auditory diet based on centuries old traditions of Sur, Taal, Laya and Raags is presented in a structured way to listen to, and sing along for those interested. 

Starting with schools already over 10000 students have got tremendous benefits of this nutrition and also got connected to Hindustani Music and our rich culture. We are now scaling up, and aim to reach every individual with our simple, accessible and low cost platform.
